thread.title_full: UpRight Law reviewed by Dee S. McQuirk

author: Dee S. McQuirk
title: Dee S. McQuirk
text:
Never having been in the current Financial Situation ; that I now find myself. I just went to the Internet and Googled "Bankruptcy" Attorney's in Little Elm, Texas...and there it was; Upright Law...after doing my Research, I find that they have an A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau; which was in my opinion, a Very Good thing...some of the Boomer Generation; are still impressed with the BBB rating...(at least, this Boomer is) sort of the Gold Standard one might say. I was very impressed with the scope, range and ability this Law Firm has. They are literally a Nationwide Law Firm... One can literally take care of Business Online; and I believe that includes every State in the Union. I cannot fathom the kind of brilliance that it takes to have the Kind of System and software to Manage a Business Nationally...Literally a Network of Law Professionals all over the Nation. At any rate, I called, and spoke with a Young Professional named Angelo. Angelo explained all the nuts and bolts, in's and out's of what, based on the information I had provided him; which Choice was perfect for my situation. I told him that I was very frightened (My Husband passed away in May of 2016) and I had just simply never taken care of anything of this Magnitude In my entire life. Angelo assured me that everything would be absolutely fine, and I should have no worries, as the folks at Upright Law had the reins now. I was told should you have any questions or concerns regarding any part of your situation, give us a call...we are "Here" for you...Well, I have done just that...I truly believe the Lord led me to this company via the internet; because I Prayed for his Guidance in this matter...and everything I needed was right there in front of me...and that something is "Upright Law" I have and will continue to recommend Upright Law to my "Friends and Family"...I do not know what I would do without them...They are the Epitomy of Excellence, Kindness and Caring...and they have proven these wonderful Honest traits many times to me...
Respectfully Submitted,
Doris S. McQuirk
Little Elm, Texas 75068
